scripts.setup: cd plain && npm i && cd ../method && npm i && cd ../directive && npm i && cd ../compiler && npm i && cd ../
scripts.setup:clean: cd plain && rm -rf ./node_modules ./package-lock.json && cd ../method && rm -rf ./node_modules ./package-lock.json && cd ../directive && rm -rf ./node_modules ./package-lock.json && cd ../compiler && rm -rf ./node_modules ./package-lock.json && cd ../
scripts.build: cd plain && npm run build && cd ../method && npm run build && cd ../directive && npm run build && cd ../compiler && npm run build && cd ../
